name: web_project_4
description: This project containes a clone feed in a social media fashion, at this stage you can edit the profile "name" and "about me" fields but the values wont be saved after a refresh is done to the page because the site isnt connected to a data-base. In this project, I have implemented my first lines of JavaScript and it was a lot of fun and very interesting to try a different method of creation which is not very visual like css.
author: Nahar Shertz
